Serialisierte Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Klasse Network

      class Network extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialisierte Felder

        • layers
          Layer[] layers
          Array of layer configurations
        • size
          int size
          Total number of layers in the network
        • weights
          double[][][] weights
          3D array of network weights: - First dimension: layer index - Second dimension: input neuron index (including bias) - Third dimension: output neuron index
